Rikers Island is a sinking hotspot

A 2016 NASA study shows that darker areas,

especially east of Riker's, South Bronx and La Guardia

Airport, are sinking faster than the rest of New York City.

RIKER’S ISLAND

Source: InSAR data from NASA

Graphics by: Ananya Chetia

Rikers Island is a sinking hotspot

A 2016 study from NASA shows that darker areas,

especially east of Riker's, South Bronx and La Guardia Airport,

are sinking faster than Manhattan and other lighter areas.

RIKER’S ISLAND

Graphics by: Ananya Chetia

Source: InSAR data from NASA

are sinking faster than Manhattan and other lighter areas.
